formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'ICONV' =-
[Syntax] ICONV(in-charset,out-charset,string)
[Synopsis] Converts charsets of strings.
[Description] Converts string from in-charset into out-charset. For available charsets, use 'iconv -l' on your shell command line. Note: due to limitations within the API, ICONV will not currently work with charsets with embedded NULLs. If found, the string will terminate.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
